[[Image:Bhorash.png|thumb|right|200px|A map showing the location of Bhorash on the continent of Essos.]]
'''Bhorash''' is a ruined city in [[Essos]]. The city is located on the northern shore of [[Slaver's Bay]]. It is northeast of [[Tolos]] and west of [[Meereen]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/meereen/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Meereen entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the city lies to the north-east of the Black Cliffs. Bhorash is connected by [[Valyria]]n roads to Mantarys and Tolos. It is in ruins, presumably destroyed in the [[Doom of Valyria]].
